statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_link FROM knowledge_resources;
SELECT resource_name, user_id FROM knowledge_resources WHERE user_id = '001';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_resources WHERE resource_type = 'article';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, user_preferences FROM knowledge_resources WHERE user_preferences ->> 'category' = 'technology';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type, user_id FROM knowledge_resources WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_resources WHERE user_preferences->>'category' = 'technology' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM knowledge_resources WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND resource_type IN ('article', 'video');
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM knowledge_resources WHERE resource_type = 'article' AND user_preferences->>'language' = 'English' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, user_id FROM knowledge_resources WHERE resource_name ILIKE '%database%' AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_resources WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT resource_name, author FROM knowledge_resources WHERE resource_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_1 DESC, preference_2 ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT resource_name, category FROM knowledge_resources WHERE category = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_resources ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, resource_name FROM user_preferences INNER JOIN knowledge_resources ON user_preferences.user_id = knowledge_resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM knowledge_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Article';
SELECT user_id, resource_name, recommendation_score FROM recommendation_log WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2, resource_type FROM user_preferences JOIN knowledge_resources ON user_preferences.user_id = knowledge_resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '1234'
SELECT preference_1, preference_3 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '5678'
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM knowledge_resources WHERE resource_type = 'article'
SELECT * FROM recommendation_log WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(resource_id) AS resource_count FROM recommendation_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING resource_count > 5
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_age < 25 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id, relevance_score FROM recommendations WHERE relevance_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT user_name, user_age FROM users ORDER BY user_age DESC;
SELECT resource_name, link FROM resources WHERE category = 'Education' AND subcategory = 'Science';
SELECT user_name, resource_name, relevance_score FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id JOIN resources ON recommendations.resource_id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT resource_title, resource_link, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'article';
SELECT user_id, resource_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_details FROM preferences_history ORDER BY history_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 AND user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_name, resource_title, interaction_type FROM users INNER JOIN user_interactions ON users.user_id = user_interactions.user_id;
